text:
League 1
PSG: an XXL gesture of the club for Mbapp√© to counter the offer of Real Madrid?
Kylian Mbapp√© dreams of a lot of clubs. Among them, Real Madrid is more and more urgent. Indeed, the White House could offer the astronomical sum of 300 million euros for the PSG striker.
05 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Mourad Bennis



Alfred GomisDijonIcon Sport



Youcef AtalOGC NiceIcon Sport



William SalibaASSEIcon Sport



Edson MexerBordeauxIcon Sport



Jordan AmaviOMIcon Sport



Didier NdongDijonIcon Sport



Baptiste SantamariaAngersIcon Sport



Gael KakutaAmiensIcon Sport



Ui-jo HwangBordeauxIcon Sport



Memphis DepayOLIcon Sport



Denis BouangaASSEIcon Sport



St√©phane JobardDijonIcon Sport

Bouanga, Depay, Amavi ... the typical team of the weekend in Ligue 1




In recent months, Real Madrid president Florentino P√©rez has only one idea in mind: to find a viable solution to attract Kylian Mbapp√©. Aware of the danger in Madrid, the PSG is preparing a new contract for its French nugget.




Paris is ready to make an XXL bid to retain Mbapp√©




Kylian Mbapp√© + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Real Madrid is in the starting blocks. Having struggled in the offensive since the departure of Cristiano Ronaldo, the Merengue are looking for a new headliner. And Florentino P√©rez is in love with a player named Kylian Mbapp√©. The club merengue would be willing to put 300 million euros to vacillate the PSG next summer according to information from the Parisian. But other serious contenders, like Bar√ßa and Manchester City, could invest 400 million euros on the young prodigy Paris.
Despite this wave of interest regarding the 2018 world champion, PSG would be determined to extend the contract of Kylian Mbapp√©, who runs for the moment until 2022. The Parisian leaders would be ready to offer an abysmal salary to the native of Bondy, 37 million euros gross per year (the same salary as Neymar JR). This mark of recognition could make the Mbapp√© clan think. The latter has not yet made a decision and would wait to see the performance of the PSG in the Champions League this season. In the event of another defeat in C1, Kylian Mbapp√©, very ambitious, could leave the Parisian ship.
